speaker: Viral image
vclaim: A photo showing that Joe Biden is kissing a woman behind Lindsay Graham.
date: stated on March 31, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: No, Joe Biden didn't film kissing a woman behind Lindsay Graham.
text: In late March, a former legislator in Nevada accused former Vice-President Joe Biden of kissing and touching her. The allegation has raised old allegations that Biden, a potential presidential candidate, is acting inappropriately with women. It also inspired some new images, the supposed evidence of such behaviour. In one picture, posted on Facebook on March 31, it appears that Baiden is kissing a woman a few feet behind the U.S. Lindsay Graham. However, the picture was altered, and the article was referred to as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) The original photo of the video is still by Daily Caler, columnist Benny Johnson. Johnson recorded Graham's departure from a woman protesting against Brett Cavanaugh's candidacy for the Supreme Court, according to Johnson's story on October 5,. Paiden's not in the picture. In the written picture, her mouth is open like she's screaming or gasping at the surprise. But watching the recording, she's obviously yelling at Graham. "We vote you out of office," you say as Graham sets his tie and smiles at the camera. Facebook was published on January 11, 2021 in the Facebook newspaper Nancy Belusi, who was no longer the Speaker of the House of Representatives by Samantha Buterman. But Facebook commentators seem to think that the fake picture with Paden is real. "What a stranger," wrote one woman. "Does he have to pee on women all the time? Where's his wife?" "Old Joe in it again," wrote someone else. But another woman was wise in the story of Daley Caller. She said, "Butchupd." "And there's a Cic video to prove it."
